org.netbeans.modules.java.api.common.queries

Interface MultiModuleGroupQuery


  • public interface MultiModuleGroupQuery
    Provides module-related extended information on SourceGroup. In a multi-module project with multiple source roots and module paths defined by masks, several package roots may reside in folder with the same name (e.g. "classes"). The default SourceGroup presentation (display name) includes module information, so the user can identify individual package root folders. In some cases, different presentation, or more precise information on relationship between a SourceGroup and module is needed. Such information can be obtained using MultiModuleGroupQuery.

    The object can be obtained from project Lookup. If it is not present, the project does not support java modules.

    If the source level of the project is 8 or less, the MultiModuleGroupQuery may be present, but will return null on all queries, as modules are not supported before JDK9.

    Since:
    1.103

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  MultiModuleGroupQuery.Result
      Describes properties of a SourceGroup related to modular structure of the project.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SourceGroup[] filterModuleGroups(String modName, SourceGroup[] groups)
      Determines which SourceGroups are owned by a particular module.
      MultiModuleGroupQuery.Result findModuleInfo(SourceGroup grp)
      Obtains module-related information for the passed SourceGroup.

    • Method Detail

      • findModuleInfo

        @CheckForNull
MultiModuleGroupQuery.Result findModuleInfo(@NonNull
                                                          SourceGroup grp)
        Obtains module-related information for the passed SourceGroup. Returns null, if SourceGroup is not known, is not owned by any module, or language level for the project does not support modules.
        Parameters:
        grp - not null, the SourceGroup instance
        Returns:
        module-related information, or null

      • filterModuleGroups

        @NonNull
SourceGroup[] filterModuleGroups(@NonNull
                                          String modName,
                                          @NonNull
                                          SourceGroup[] groups)
        Determines which SourceGroups are owned by a particular module. Returns SourceGroups contained within the module, empty array if module does not exist or does not contain any of the passed SourceGroups.
        Parameters:
        modName - module name
        groups - groups, to filter.
        Returns:
        SourceGroups contained by that particular module.
